actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to transfer certain lands of the United States to the city of Alexandria, Va., to facilitate the establishment of parks and recreation areas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to transfer specified lands of the United States to the city of Alexandria, Virginia, to facilitate the establishment of parks, recreation areas, and a pedestrian mall.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to transfer certain lands of the United States to the city of Alexandria, Va., to facilitate the establishment of parks and recreation areas.
